approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender can spend on behalf of the user.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified user.

blacklistAccount.description: Adds or removes an account from the blacklist.

burn.description: Destroys a specified amount of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to get the user representation of the token.

destroyBlackFunds.description: Destroys the tokens of a blacklisted user.

isBlacklisted.description: Checks if an address is blacklisted.

isOwner.description: Checks if the specified address is the owner.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

Approval.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.

DestroyedBlackFunds.description: Emitted when a blacklisted user's funds are destroyed.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership is transferred from one account to another.

Pause.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one account to another.

Unpause.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.
